BETTING FORECAST: 7/4 Chain Of Events, 4/1 Corres, 4/1 Thingathong, 11/2 Golden Gates, 10/1 Senate, 14/1 Three White Socks, 25/1 Inlovingmemory, 33/1 Goodlukin Lucy, 33/1 Rumballina, 50/1 Enchanting Smile, 100/1 Penderyn, 100/1 Sharakti.

Our expert's view of the main contenders and likely winner of the race. Part of RACINGPOST.com Members' Club

Probably just an average maiden and Thingathong is a newcomer to note, particularly if attracting support, but CHAIN OF EVENTS´ proven ability to handle soft ground could prove the key factor. He showed promise on his debut and there were probably excuses for his subsequent failure. Golden Gates may be best of the others.
